ratingStyle.title: You rate like...
ratingStyle.generousSoulFooter: Average score: {{score}} ‚Äî You see the best in everything
ratingStyle.harshCriticFooter: Average score: {{score}} ‚Äî High standards, no compromises
ratingStyle.perfectionistFooter: Average score: {{score}} ‚Äî It's either masterpiece or miss. No in-between
ratingStyle.completionistFooter: Average score: {{score}} ‚Äî You finish everything, even the rough ones
ratingStyle.hypeRiderFooter: Average score: {{score}} ‚Äî Your taste lines up with the community, and that's perfectly fine
ratingStyle.contrarianFooter: Average score: {{score}} ‚Äî You trust your own judgment over popular opinions
ratingStyle.balancedReviewerFooter: Average score: {{score}} ‚Äî Fair and measured in every rating you give
ratingStyle.wildCardFooter: Average score: {{score}} ‚Äî Unpredictable and impossible to pin down
